chapters.title: Chapter 4: The Gleeman
chapters.info: Thomdril (Thom) Merrilin, p. 40—Gleeman who comes to Emond's Field on Winternight. He seems to have a distrust of Aes Sedai and their ways. He has white hair and mustaches, and wears a patched cloak. He was once a Court-bard. Fond of elaborate bows and flourishes. See also Merrilin, Owyn; Trakand, Morgase.
